All the fun. Zero ads. Bring Twitter back to X.

Tired of seeing ads on Twitter? Our new Twitter X Ad Blocker extension hides all those pesky promoted tweets and sponsored content, allowing you to focus on the content you actually want to see.

The Ad Blocker will detect and remove all ads from your Twitter feed and trends. No more interruptions or distractions - just a clean, ad-free Twitter experience.

The Twitter X Ad Blocker works across all browsers and devices, blocking ads on desktop.

Take back control of your Twitter feed. Get the Twitter X Ad Blocker extension today and say goodbye to annoying ads!
